commitResults.messageTitle: Add confirmation dialog when cancelling edit
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, when editing an issue title/description,
clicking 'Cancel' immediately cancels the edit.

This might cause users who accidentally press 'Cancel'
to lose all their progress in writing the description.

Let's,
* add a warning dialog that pops up when users press 'Cancel'
* swap the positions of the 'Save' and 'Cancel' buttons.

commitResults.messageTitle: Allow duplicate issues to inherit labels/assignees from parent issue (#852)
commitResults.messageBody:
Allow duplicate issues to inherit response from parent issue

Currently, when an issue is marked as a duplicate,
the severity/bug type/assignees/response label
still need to be filled in manually.

Users should not need to fill in these values as duplicate issues
should inherit these values from the parent issues.

Let's,
* hide these fields in the response form
* disable the editing of these fields on the view issue page
* update these fields automatically when editing the parent issue
if an issue is marked as a duplicate.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix cursor position after pasting image (#857)
commitResults.messageBody:
Currently, the user may experience inconvenience after pasting an image
into the comment editor, since the cursor may jump to the image url
after a successful upload. This occurs if the user continues to type
after pasting the image.

Let's fix this issue by changing the logic of calculating the new
position of the cursor after uploading an image.

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve viewing bug report on github ui (#854)
commitResults.messageBody:
Improve viewing bug report on github ui

Currently, the icon and the tooltip for the "view bug report on github"
button is not intuitive and can cause confusion on whether the button
copies the link into the clipboard or open the link in a new tab.

Let's change the icon to the "open in new" icon from Material Icons
and make the tooltip/label clearer.

Running npm run lint with updated Angular 8.0 raises
event is deprecated error.

Let's remove all the deprecated event references and
replace them with $event.

commitResults.messageTitle: Apply prettier on all ts/json/html files (#869)
commitResults.messageBody:
Apply prettier on all ts/json/html files

The PR #864 that applied prettier to the whole codebase
did not format some of the relevant files.

Let's ensure that all typescript, json and html files are
formatted accordingly.

Extract session-selection from auth component

Currently, the AuthComponent manages the form used
for sesssion selection and triggers the OAuth process.

Let's move this logic (and related view) into a child
component.

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix error snackbar and team response assignee bugs (#860)
commitResults.messageBody:
The error message shown in the error snackbar can be too
long, resulting in text that overflows out of the snackbar.
Also, the response appears to be submitted even though
there are errors in the assignees.

Let's edit the layout of the error snackbar and handle such
errors properly by checking if the selected users are
authorized to be assignees before submitting the comment
in the team response phase.

Add better logging

The diagnostics for this application needs to be improved. This is such
that when errors in the application during runtime are caused by
GitHub errors, we can better find tackle the cause and do the necessary
debugging.

Let's add different logging for development and production mode and
log more statements when calling the GitHub API.

commitResults.messageTitle: Enforce character limit of issue title (#861)
commitResults.messageBody:
Title form fields allow more than 256 characters which can cause 
a GitHub error.

Let's,
* limit input of issue title to 256 characters
* show remaining characters when approaching that limit

commitResults.messageTitle: Disable marking duplicated issue as duplicate (#855)
commitResults.messageBody:
Disable marking duplicated issue as duplicate

Currently, it is possible to mark an already duplicated issue as a
duplicate of another issue, which causes the first issue to be
marked as faulty

Let's disable marking a duplicated issue as a duplicate, and instead
show the issues that are duplicating it

commitResults.messageTitle: Improve styling of no internet connection alert (#853)
commitResults.messageBody:
Improve styling of no internet connection alert

Currently, having no internet connection is indicated by a paragraph 
below the app header

Let's remove it, and instead trigger an error via the 
ErrorHandlingService to show an Error Snackbar

Currently, prettier is only applied to the tests and e2e directories

However, it is not applied to src, resulting in inconsistent formatting

Let's apply prettier to src, run prettier once to format the code, and
install tslint-config-prettier to prevent conflicts between tslint and
prettier in the future

commitResults.messageTitle: Fix response tag overlapping with assignee (#859)
commitResults.messageBody:
Fix response column overlapping with assignee

Currently, when the window size is too narrow, the response column will
overlap with the assignee column

Let's use flexbox to adjust the column widths, and add horizontal scroll
bars for columns that don't have enough space
